https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i8Di907xNbtLDWUanjQrbdtr1F2.jpg An Indian family decide to stay at home and drown rather than make way for the Narmada dam Three choices. Move to the slums in the city, accept a place at a resettlement site or stay at home and drown. The people of Jalsindhi in central India must make a decision fast. Drowned Out
